channel.title: Client Freeze up
channel.description:
It will start to load then freeze up at 60% now it goes straight to 60% don't even load anything before it. it dose it to any other client i download, for online clients it will freeze and then black screen with a darker black box were the load percentage is.
[img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/516/clienthq.jpg[/img]
any ideas why?? i could really use the help
Info: * Running on Windows XP * Screen/loading freezes can still click file * I Do Have Team Viewer
